alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 23 at 8:53AM MDT until June 24 at 6:43AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River Near Nepesta affecting Pueblo County. Arkansas River At La Junta affecting Otero County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River Near Fowler affecting Otero and Crowley Counties. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Nepesta, and La Junta, ...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Arkansas River Near Nepesta. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.5 feet, Moderate Flood. Agricultural lands near Nepesta flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM MDT Friday the stage was 16.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall to 13.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then rise to 13.9 feet tomorrow evening. It will fall to 13.1 feet Monday morning then rise again. - Flood stage is 16.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.6 feet on 05/21/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Arkansas River Nepesta 16.5 16.4 Fri 8 am MDT 13.5 13.4 13.1 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this morning at 1000 AM MDT.
